title: Putin’s Inaccurate Historical Propaganda : The History of the Russian and Ukrainian Relations

media:group.media:title: Putin’s Inaccurate Historical Propaganda : The History of the Russian and Ukrainian Relations
media:group.media:description:
Links to humanitarian organizations helping Ukrainian Refugees.

RESOURCES FOR UKRAINIAN REFUGEES AND SUPPORTERS
-https://docs.google.com/document/u/1/d/1OlZIz-72A2xI2uUOFE07L5ObQGP4JDcXZ2vdIs2P9BQ/mobilebasic

Polish Government Websites for Refugees seeking help
-https://www.gov.pl/web/ua
-https://pomagamukrainie.gov.pl/

Slovak Government Websites for Refugees seeking help
-https://ua.gov.sk/?csrt=17848135974483993656
-https://pomocpreukrajinu.sk/

Estonian Websites helping refugees
-https://www.pagulasabi.ee/en

Information for Ukrainians escaping to Germany/Switzerland/Poland
-https://www.lphr.org/en/info-flucht/

Romanian Website helping Ukrainian Refugees
-https://www.gov.ro/ro/ucraina-impreuna-ajutam-mai-mult#english

Hungarian Website helping Ukrainian Refugees
-https://helsinki.hu/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/HHC_Ukraine_Guide_2022_03_09_UA.pdf

Websites to help find shelter for Ukrainians across Europe.
-https://www.eu4ua.org/
-https://www.facebook.com/UkrainiansFindAHost/
-https://www.ukraineshelter.com/en?fbclid=IwAR151Pa0UUvO1ANt-Px39Ybr_4Yophfz8NkgFqvNSOqg9-kFVEwM4ej6I5c
-https://www.host4ukraine.com/
-https://everybedhelps.com/?fbclid=IwAR10RsNpeR3TD1sfYLzA7DJzylOSEZSQxbbvMFQ1zhgB1v9E1U0ISccA6Mc
-https://www.ukrainenow.org/looking-for-help-abroad
-https://wunderflats.com/page/ukraine/tenants-in-need-ua

How you can help Ukraine- https://how-to-help-ukraine-now.super.site/
Links to donate to various Ukrainian Institutions- https://help-ukraine.carrd.co/

With the help of my friends and other humanitarian organizations I tried my best to find as many links and as much information as possible. If there are any problems with the information provided or you have extra information you would like to add please share them in the comments.
